content.raw:
gzclient. gdb trace under Intel on Trusty. Ogre 1.9.

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff0821cc7 in Ogre::SceneManager::firePreRenderQueues() ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff0821cc7 in Ogre::SceneManager::firePreRenderQueues() ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#1  0x00007ffff08230b5 in Ogre::SceneManager::renderVisibleObjectsDefaultSequence() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#2  0x00007ffff0835088 in Ogre::SceneManager::_renderScene(Ogre::Camera*, Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#3  0x00007ffff08b3e6b in Ogre::Camera::_renderScene(Ogre::Viewport*, bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#4  0x00007ffff08046ee in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateViewport(Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#5  0x00007ffff08046ab in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateAutoUpdatedViewports(bool)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#6  0x00007ffff080425e in Ogre::RenderTarget::updateImpl() ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#7  0x00007ffff0804854 in Ogre::RenderTarget::update(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#8  0x00007ffff0cd28ac in gazebo::rendering::Camera::Render (this=0xac40c70, 
    _force=_force@entry=false)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc:400

    this=0x68ec490)
```
